__e: If Pierre is going to my neighbourhood, I'll leave with him now ...
And it's not because Pierre is going to help, that you will succeed.
I mean, if Pierre is good, so will you be...
Pierre's very nice to me, I don't mind him, but... I wish you wouldn't talk about him like that.
S you realize that Pierre ? My best friend? !
I met a girl at Pierre's, her name's Zoe.
You see, young lady, I'm old Pierre, the handyman.
Pierre, um, what do you know about the men who work on death row?
I already told big Pierre, and I'm not going over it again with li'l Paul.
What do you mean, "What's up with me and Pierre?"
You must find somewhere within yourself the strength to carry on Pierre's work and you own. Ha?
